comment: по клику на подсудимого в очереди

languages.text: "Я каюсь! Каюсь! Пожалуйста, только не виселица и не огонь!"
"I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"
languages.original_text: "Я каюсь! Каюсь! Пожалуйста, только не виселица и не огонь!"

traits.locale_text: "I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"
"I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"
"I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"
"I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"
"I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"
"I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"

languages.text: “我忏悔！我忏悔！求求你了，只要别绞死我，别烧死我，什么都行！”
languages.original_text: "I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"

traits.locale_text: “我忏悔！我忏悔！求求你了，只要别绞死我，别烧死我，什么都行！”

languages.text: 「罪を悔います！罪を悔いますから！お願いします、絞首台と火炙りだけはお許しください！」
languages.original_text: "I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"

traits.locale_text: 「罪を悔います！罪を悔いますから！お願いします、絞首台と火炙りだけはお許しください！」

languages.text: «¡Me arrepiento! ¡Me arrepiento! ¡Cualquier cosa menos la horca o el fuego, por favor!».
languages.original_text: "I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Me arrepiento! ¡Me arrepiento! ¡Cualquier cosa menos la horca o el fuego, por favor!».

languages.text: "Ich bereue! Ich bereue! Bitte, alles, nur nicht der Galgen oder das Feuer!"
languages.original_text: "I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bereue! Ich bereue! Bitte, alles, nur nicht der Galgen oder das Feuer!"

languages.text: « Je me repens ! Je me repens ! Pitié, tout sauf la potence et le bûcher ! »
languages.original_text: "I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"

traits.locale_text: « Je me repens ! Je me repens ! Pitié, tout sauf la potence et le bûcher ! »

languages.text: "Tövbe! Tövbe! Lütfen! Darağacı veya ateş olmasın!"
languages.original_text: "I repent! I repent! Please, anything but the gallows or the fire!"

traits.locale_text: "Tövbe! Tövbe! Lütfen! Darağacı veya ateş olmasın!"
